name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Call of Duty Live Wallpaper Animed Background

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bring the battlefield to your browser! Download now for an immersive Call of Duty wallpaper and enhance your new tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Step into the world of Call of Duty with the Live Wallpaper Chrome extension! Every new tab brings the action-packed intensity of the iconic game to your screen, with dynamic, high-quality visuals from your favorite Call of Duty maps, characters, and weapons.

Key Features:
Dynamic Live Wallpaper: Immerse yourself in the Call of Duty universe with stunning animated backgrounds from the game.
Clock & Date Display: Stay on schedule while enjoying your favorite game-themed aesthetics.
Quick Access Links: Instantly access your favorite websites with easy-to-use shortcuts.
More Features: Discover additional extensions, access the privacy policy, or uninstall the extension effortlessly.
With Call of Duty Live Wallpaper, you’re not just personalizing your browser—you’re bringing the excitement of battle to every new tab. Perfect for fans of the franchise who want their browser to reflect their passion for action and gaming.

Download now to experience Call of Duty every time you open a new tab!
